titleStmt.title: Robert Earle of Essex his ghost, sent from Elizian to the nobility, gentry, and communaltie of England.
titleStmt.author: Scott, Thomas, 1580?-1626.

notesStmt.note: The imprint is fictitious; in fact printed in London by John Beale? (STC).
"A post-script, or, A second part of Robert Earle of Essex his ghost" has separate pagination and title page with same imprint; register is continuous.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
